bike.description: Specialized E5 aluminum, fully manipulated tubing, smooth weld, compact design, inside rear triangle disc mount, internal cable routing, integrated headset, fender/rack eyelets, center kickstand plate

components.description: Aluminum legs/crown, Cr-Mo steerer, 52mm fully integrated headset, fender/rack eyelets, internal light cable routing
1 1/8" sealed Cr-Mo bearings integrated w/ headset, 20mm alloy cone spacer with 20mm of spacers
Specialized Elite-Set, 3D forged alloy, 4-position adjustable, 4-bolt 31.8mm clamp
Body Geometry lock-on for bar ends
Tektro linear pull, cold-forged, cartridge pads
Tektro linear pull, cold-forged, cartridge pads
Sirrus pedal, nylon body, symmetric alloy cage, low profile bearing system, toe clip capable
DRX300 Disc, alloy double-wall, sleeved, CNC machined, 32h
Supernova Infinity 8 dynamo hub, Freespin technology switchable drag, QR
Specialized Espoir Sport Reflect w/ double BlackBelt, 60 TPI, wire bead, 700x30c
Specialized Espoir Sport Reflect w/ double BlackBelt, 60 TPI, wire bead, 700x30c
31.8 clamp ID, superlight forged and machined alloy
Racktime Ultra, Specialized custom, hollow alloy, max. load 10kg
Specialized aluminum, anodized finish, aluminum struts, "hidden" rack mount bracket
